title: Slow Fade 2011 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
Through friends he meets Jessie, a Christian girl who moves into the neighborhood and soon the two are close.
Thomas seems to be living a dream by the woman he loves with his friends and his mother.
But the emptiness and personal frustrations that the world can not satisfy, he loses control and finds herself in a mundane and worthless life.
When his mother, who raised him alone, without a father, says they will be evicted, he decides to fight and take justice into their own hands and commits an offense. Only God had perfect plans for his life.
The least likely to help man Thomas becomes his prophet and shows God's mercy and compassion that Jesus alone can give.
He is asked to make covenant with Jesus Christ and return to live in truth and sincerity.
An inspiring film and restorative, helping to rescue the sheep that are lost, shows the truth of life with Christ and that without Him we can do nothing.
